Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory121.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Have we reached our destination...?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The opening sound of the door closed firmly by the people before interrupts Sophia mid-sentence, drawing the attention of everyone.'}
{3: 'In the center of attention are the two ladies who just ended a battle, with the Corrupted corpses under their feet.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Lucia! And Miss Bianca... Your frame...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: "I only changed into a frame that's more suitable for this situation, do not be alarmed.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Are you here to help?', 3: '17', 4: "Where's Lee?", 5: '18'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Your commands, please, Commandant of Gray Raven.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Sorry, we were deployed in different directions and didn't have time to meet up, but I was able to sense Lee's signal all this time, so he should be fine.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jamilah', 3: "...So you're the one Babylonia sent to make the deal?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: "I'd like to welcome you if I could, but as you can see, you came at a rather inconvenient timing.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: "I noticed, looks like I've entered at the wrong time... You were saying? Don't mind me, please continue.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Before that... Can I ask a question?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Did Babylonia accept our deal?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Bianca pauses and glances at the crowd, and nods her head.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: "Babylonia has agreed to Akdilek's terms.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: '...But I do not think moving to Babylonia is such a joyous thing.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Bianca meets Sophia's shimmering gaze, as if she had read the girl's mind."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'You should be able to suggest something better.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Suggest something better... Me?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Believe in yourself.', 3: '44', 4: 'Are you thinking of backing down?', 5: '45'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'No, I will not back down no matter what. I am a part of Akdilek, so I can be a good merchant too!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Sophia makes up her mind and pulls out her gun—'}
{3: 'Before anyone can react, she places the gun on the floor where anyone can reach.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: "I'm not familiar with negotiations, so if anyone disagrees with me, they are welcome to execute me with this gun afterward and continue your quarreling.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'With that said... Leader, Lord Ashlar, and everyone here, no matter aristocrats or commoners, I want to propose a trade to you all!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'And what kind of trade would that be?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: "I may not know how to achieve it right now, but I'll create a world that doesn't need this train or Babylonia.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ashlar', 3: 'You must be joking... Without the train and without Babylonia, everyone would be infected by the Punishing...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ashlar', 3: 'Enough with your rubbish!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: "I don't know how to make it a reality yet, but I will succeed. I don't want to hide in that lonely space nor do I want to become an Ascendant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "I only wish to be able to protect the things I want to protect, to protect all of Akdilek. So let's make a deal!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'I will create a real final destination for everyone, not a fake one where you just accept what comes.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'But one where we walk this Earth again with our own strength!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ashlar', 3: 'What nonsense...!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: "No... I find it quite interesting, don't you?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1000', 2: 'Are you alright?', 3: '79', 4: 'My thoughts exactly.', 5: '80'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'I only fainted earlier due to exhaustion, no need for you to worry.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "That's the Sophia I know...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Aston', 3: 'Leader, since Babylonia has already gone through with our deal, we should stick to our original plan...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ashlar', 3: "We should continue on with our original deal here, what the brat's saying here is just...", 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'She proposed this trade to all of Akdilek, not just a specific person, so this decision is in the hands of everyone. Everyone has a right to choose. So what do you think, people of Akdilek? Who do you want to support?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Commoner A', 3: "O-of course Sophia!! She's one of us so she understands our situation!"}
{2: 'Aristocrat A', 3: 'We should just settle for going to Babylonia, and not make some gibberish deal... Who gave Constructs the right to speak up anyway...'}
{2: 'Commoner B', 3: "If we commoners get to choose too, then I choose Sophia! She's saved me before too..."}
{2: 'Aristocrat B', 3: "Now that I think about it, the Ascendants never guaranteed to make us Ascendants... And they look like they're up to no good..."}
{2: 'Aristocrat A', 3: 'Walking on Earth again with our own power... If only it was that easy...'}
{2: 'Agitated Commoner', 3: "We can't run forever! I'd rather fight for my future with my own two hands than rely on some unknown source."}
{2: 'Whispering Aristocrats', 3: "They have a point... She's a Construct, maybe she really is that strong..."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ashlar', 3: 'Preposterous, both the aristocrats and commoners...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'Sophia, do you still remember our conversation from before? What should you do to ensure a larger profit when making a deal?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: '...Choose the option with a higher risk.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'And that, is the final answer from me and my fellow merchants.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Let's take the first step then.", 3: '108', 4: "Then let's go get the merchandise.", 5: '108'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: "Looks like a decision has been made. The trade between Babylonia and Akdilek ends here then... Now it's time for Constructs to get to work.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory134.png'}
{3: 'On the roof of the carriage is a figure in blue struggling to keep the Corrupted at bay. He quickens his pace as he hears sounds from the stairs.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryRedSmokeNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{3: 'And kicked the enemy off the train with one powerful movement.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryRedSmokeNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "I don't want to sound like I'm parroting someone, but what took you so long?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'You were waiting here for us?', 3: '125', 4: 'That frame...', 5: '126'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Because you guys seemed to be discussing something important down there and that's not really my scene.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'I had time so I changed frames.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory145.jpg'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{2: 'Rail Heterozygote', 3: '—!'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory134.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "I didn't have any weapons, so I could only stall for time... Can you lend me your guns, Sophia?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: 'But I proposed this deal myself...', 4: '2'}

{2: 'Lee', 3: 'If I remember correctly, a Support Construct isn\'t built for continuous highspeed battles. Even though it\'s a request from my side, consider it me aiding you for "free" if you must think of it this way.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'There\'s nothing scarier than "free." But thank you.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "With our full squad here and Bianca's support, we will eliminate the enemy this time, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Let's get started.", 3: '142', 4: "We're not letting it go away this time.", 5: '142'}
